description:
Legendary costumes for original WARRIORS OROCHI officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Dodomeki, Gyūki, Hundun, Diamondback, Zeus, Athena, Ares, Odin, and Perseus

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Legendary Costumes OROCHI Pack 3
